content: Hello! What is the best method to translate lean 3 syntax to lean 4 not manually? From what I understand, mathport does not work as well as intended with newer lean 4 versions and there are no well-discussed tools (at least, none I could find browsing for a while). Are there any new options or did the problem of translation lose its relevance completely?
It has no further relevance. I guess you can always come up with a contrived scenario where someone would still want to do that, but they will never justify the time investment that would be needed.
Probably you can use mathport to translate to an early lean4 version and then bump manually, but yeah, it's unlikely that anyone still has much of a need for it
